languages.text: "Я поверю вам и оставлю "Обод Эриоха" в покое. Пока что".
"I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."
languages.original_text: "Я поверю вам и оставлю "Обод Эриоха" в покое. Пока что".

traits.locale_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."
"I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."
"I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

"I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."
"I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

languages.text: "Ich glaube Euch und werde Heriokh's Rim verschonen. Vorerst."
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube Euch und werde Heriokh's Rim verschonen. Vorerst."

languages.text: « Je veux bien vous croire sur parole et laisser la Faille d'Heriokh tranquille... pour l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien vous croire sur parole et laisser la Faille d'Heriokh tranquille... pour l'instant. »

languages.text: «Les creo, y dejaré en paz Borde de Heriokh. Por ahora».
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

traits.locale_text: «Les creo, y dejaré en paz Borde de Heriokh. Por ahora».

languages.text: 「お前を信じて、ヘリオクのリムはそっとしておこう。今のところは」
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を信じて、ヘリオクのリムはそっとしておこう。今のところは」

languages.text: “我相信你的话，我暂时不会再打扰赫里奥卡之环了。”
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."

traits.locale_text: “我相信你的话，我暂时不会再打扰赫里奥卡之环了。”

languages.text: "Sana inanıyorum ve şimdilik Heriokh'un Ağzı'nı rahat bırakacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will believe you and leave Heriokh's Rim alone. For now."
